sentences.cn: 一个非常可笑的古怪想法

sentences.en: But the energy is all – well wacky right now.
sentences.cn: 但是这股能量,呃,现在很怪.

sentences.en: Even more -- 68 per cent -- are looking for a wacky sense of humour.
sentences.cn: 更甚的是 68% 的想找有搞怪幽默感的人.

sentences.en: First there was Ace Ventura : Pet Detective, a surprise hit that show Carrey's now signature wacky style.
sentences.cn: 先有艾丝·温图拉的《宠物侦探》, 一部展示凯利特有的古怪风格的叫座影片.

sentences.en: Have you been using that wacky paste stuff that made me see my sister get eaten?
sentences.cn: 你用了那个让我看到我妹妹被吃掉的奇怪的糨糊 吗 ?

sentences.en: I chop garlic . It's a wacky world.
It is full of quirky yet weirdly believable turns - and wacky , revealing dialogue.
sentences.cn: 这部影片充满了离奇但又可信的转折以及独特而又发人深省的对话.

sentences.en: Many Norwegians consider the idea wacky, according to media reports.
sentences.cn: 据媒体报导,许多挪威人认为这个想法十分怪异.

sentences.en: Nurse Betty's a wacky but wonderful dose of reality.
sentences.cn: 《护士贝蒂》是一部关于现实荒诞但却美妙的影片.

sentences.en: Race as one of 8 wacky characters!
Some of his friends are pretty wild and wacky characters.
sentences.cn: 他的一些朋友是那种放荡不羁又怪里怪气的人。

sentences.en: Test your skills of observation in this dizzying wirlwind tour of a wacky amusement park.
sentences.cn: 游戏测试你在令人眼花缭乱的游乐园中的观察力.

sentences.en: Thankfully, gravity ensures that this wacky scenario doesn't take place.
sentences.cn: 幸好有地心引力,这种荒谬的场景不会发生. (确定表达法)

sentences.en: The hero in the movie come across as a little bit wacky.
sentences.cn: 这部电影的男主角表现得有点疯狂.

sentences.en: This team's wacky answer is way off!
sentences.cn: 这一组的答案太离谱了吧!

sentences.en: Wacky ideas are commonplace among space scientists.
sentences.cn: 太空科学家想法古怪是不足为奇的。

trans.tran_en: silly in an exciting or amusing way
